co.paralleluniverse.actors

Class LocalActorUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.paralleluniverse.actors.LocalActorUtil

  • public final class LocalActorUtil
extends Object

    Static methods that provide access to Actor’s functionality through an ActorRef if the actor is local. Application code shouldn’t normally use these methods. They are provided mainly for testing, and defining sophisticated behaviors.

    We provide these services as static methods rather than return a reference to the actor because we don’t want anyone to accidentally keep a reference to the actor itself.
